title: The Rope of Allah
transcript:
This is the rope of Allah that we should all hold 
on to strongly, we should abide by it, this is the   basics, not the books of philosophy, not the books 
of novels and stories, not the books of different   regimes like socialism or capitalism or - this 
is the only way of life, the only way to live,   and you will never prosper 
or succeed if you abandon it.
